LanguageData.Gun_DragunovSVU.label: SVU OTs-03 드라그노프
LanguageData.Gun_DragunovSVU.description: The OTs-03 SVU is a bullpup configuration of the SVD 저격소총. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. High damage, long range and very good accuracy.
LanguageData.Gun_Vintorez.label: VSS 블러디 커터
LanguageData.Gun_M42A_USCM.label: M42A 저격소총
LanguageData.Gun_M42A_USCM.description: The M42A 저격소총 is an American-made semi-automatic 저격소총 chambered for 7.62x51mm NATO ammunition. It is employed as the primary 저격소총 weapon of the United States Colonial Marine Corps.
LanguageData.RF_Gun_WA2K.label: 발터 WA 2000 소총
LanguageData.RF_Gun_WA2K.description: Limited edition olden days 저격소총. Great range, exceptional accuracy, very high damage and very low fire rate.
